script.message: Alright, just one more stop...** I was told that this is where the Halloween party is supposed to be.

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: Hello, there. Do I know you?

script.speaker: You
script.message: I'm here for the Halloween party.

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: The wh-

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: Ohhh, yeah, the Halloween party...~

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: You just so happen to be early! Come on in~
You follow the cat into their home. It's quite spooky in here, clearly they decorated for the occasion.
The cat leads you into the living room. You sit on the couch while the cat hops up onto a cushion below the TV.

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: The Master isn't here yet... and the guests are-

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: ...Not here at the moment.

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: So it's just the two of us. My name's Trick. My Master owns this house. I'm guarding it while they're gone.

script.speaker: You
script.message: I see... nice to meet you, Trick.

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: Likewise. So how do you taste?

script.speaker: You
script.message: Excuse me?

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: What's your taste? In scary movies, I mean.

script.speaker: You
script.message: Oh! I'm a big fan of NIGHTMARE GUT 2. The Mulcher is also a good one.

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: Yes, I like those too. I loved the end of The Mulcher where the protagonist got lured into the killer's house, waltzed right into their maw and got gobbled up in one gulp.

script.speaker: You
script.message: I thought that bit was scary... imagine getting eaten... it gives me chills just thinking about it!

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: Ohhh dear, I seem to have gotten a candy corn stuck in the back of my teeth! Ohhhh noooooo!

script.speaker: You
script.message: Well that's unfortunate! Need any help with that?

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: (They cannot be serious.)

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: Just come closer and I will open wide.
You scoot closer to the fairly small cat as they open their maw. Long strings of saliva connect their long, sharp fangs.

script.speaker: You
script.message: I don't see any candy corn back there... wait, do cats even eat candy corn?

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: You can't see it? Well then... we'll have to get you smaller~

script.speaker: You
script.message: Smaller-?
A bright light blinds you momentarily. When you come to, the whole world feels... bigger?
Wait, no, you're smaller! You look at your hands, and they've been transformed into little paws! You have a long, smooth tail on your butt, and your ears have grown significantly.
...You're a mouse!!
Before you can fully process your new form, a huge paw lifts you up. It's Trick...

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: There we go... you're so gullible. I had to jump through some serious mental hoops to convince the other stupid two-leggers, but you? You leaned right into my mouth!

script.speaker: You
script.message: T-Trick? What's going on? What happened to the other guests?

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: I ate them, dummy. And now, I'm gonna eat YOU~
Trick lifts you higher and higher, dangling you right above their gaping maw. They release one finger... then two...

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: Have a nice FALL~!
Trick releases you, sending you falling right down his throat. In a single gulp, you're cat kibble.

script.speaker: Trick
script.message: Master's gonna be so proud of me for eating all these pesky mice...~
